content.detailedDescription:
We've lived our address for many years now but in the last 4 years we have spotted transparent
blue beams of light which shoot down from the sky in a location of about 60 feet across, the actual beam of lights are about 2 feet across.

i want to state these lights are barely visible to the naked eye, some nights they are more noticeable
than other times, and other nights we've not seen them, these have been seen by my wife and other family members plus after friends have been told they've also seen the lights as they have explained exactly what we've seen.

i know what northern light's look like and we barely get them showing here and when we do they are
very noticeable, i'm a keen photographer and tried to capture these beams without success, i'm yet to try another dslr without infrared filter enabled, but truthfully i seem to think they are to quick for
the camera to pickup, if you want anymore information please contact myself with the email used.

regards
paul.
content.summary: Transparent beams of light

content.detailedDescription: On saturday night 5/4/15, shortly after the mayweather- pacquiao fight, i stepped out on the porch to have a cigarette at exactly 11:15 pm. i immediately looked up because a shape caught my eye that i thought at first was a bird.  i stepped out to the edge of the porch and saw a long, clear, almost cloaked, cigar shaped craft moving along a fixed line as if it was on a track. it was absolutely dead silent outside and this thing made no noise at all. i could see light reflecting off of it, but i never saw any colors,or navigation lights.  it traveled in a straight line from where i was, in a direct line towards the city of new orleans.  it was above the trees but lower than 100 ft. and never changed altitude nor direction. roughly the size of two limos side by side, i quickly stepped down to the front yard to continue watching this until it left my sight after 15 or so seconds. in the moment i was sort of paralyzed just watching it soar, but then realized what just happened.  i immediately ran inside and started writing everything that i could remember down.  this event has effected me profoundly and im really interested to know if there are any other witnesses to it.
content.summary: I saw a cigar shaped craft silently low flying on 5/2/15 in new orleans la

content.detailedDescription:
Driving may 2 2015 from olney md. west on rte 108. came upon a clearing on left side ( west ). noticed something i have never seen before having traveled this road for 11 years at this time of the evening 10pm. i noticed a group of about 10 orbs glowing bright orange about 1 mile from my location. i continued to travel in a west direction and parked on the side of the road by 10:10pm. at this point the orbs were directly to my left. i counted 10 orbs and retrieved my camera ( on phone ) and took about 5 photos. as i was observing the orbs about 8 cars had passed my location and a few had slow down to take a look but not stopping. at  to 10:35pm the orbs travel directly over my car. i opened the sunroof and could see them passing above me. there was no noise and no wind. the colors were a constant bright orange with looked like a small white spot on the bottom. most of the orbs traveled at the same rate a few traveled a bit faster as if they were "catching up". once the orbs passed over they were out of my view.

the orbs were much bigger and brighter then they show in the photos.
content.summary: 10 yellow/orange orbs evening traveling slow 10 - 30 mph low alt 200 - 500  ft

content.detailedDescription:
While hiking in park known for a 'happy landing' of a disabled airplane (with a big, open area with several fields and ridges) - a place i frequent for its excellent observation of aircraft patterns from commercial jets flying out of nyc area, i was watching the air traffic with my binoculars and trying some ce5 meditation. 
(note: i have tried this a lot over the past year, and this day, like 2 previous times when i observed a ufo, was most likely a coincidence and not due to my ce5 "thought projection". i suspect these etv's fly in certain regular routes, and i just happened to be in the right place at the right time, looking up!!!)

anyway, i see what at first looked like any high altitude aircraft - a nondescript whitish, blurry shape, moving in a straight line. however, it seems to be moving slower than any of the commercial jets & private planes in the area i typically witness;  it is making no engine noise (nor noise of any kind); it seems to slow and descend, getting bigger, to where it looks to be the size of a quarter.  it is a white circle (perhaps a sphere/ spheroid), with two antennae-like rays projecting from the front. they reminded me of the v-shaped antennae from 'my favorite martian'! anyway, the circle moved slowly and steadily against the wind in a north bound  direction, so it was no balloon, and could not have been a helicopter nor any jet or aircraft because of the slow speed, shape and lack of sound.  also, the craft seemed to glow bright white while descended, but this might have been due to the setting sun.  it was a perfectly clear blue sky as well.  

after observing the vehicle move slowly across the sky, it seemed to ascend, getting smaller, then    continuing in a straight line north, gradually speeded up, and within seconds, was out of sight. the entire event was about 4 1/2 minutes.
content.summary: While observing aircraft w/ binoculars, saw ufo traverse slowly across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
This all started with the normal fly by sighting with [name removed/cms/dr], to sum up quickly on triangle sighting: it was a mother ship round on all edges. it was so big a close it black out the stars in the night sky. it had three white light disks on the bottom, each the size of a baseball diamond or stadium. no other running light but to more disk on back side of the craft same size. the over all structure was a really dark gray, almost look like a blimp/hot air balloon the way it creased all over.

 i had to yell at my ex fiance to stop the car so i can look at it. i screamed at her in the middle of the road "why wont you look at it". she replied" there are some things god doesn't intend on us seeing". i also observed 2 people standing outside at a gas station but i didnt see them react to this event either.

the flight path was steady and slow, lasted a good 10-25 min, by the time i could get to a video camera it was so far out it appeared to be just a star on film. i can try to find it, it could still be saved on a usb disk around here. in fact i recall this "star" to still be park there to this day maybe.

but this is not what drove me to seek you out. i might really need your help with something. 
 
    i have a very long story to tell and i have already made contact with [name removed/cms/dr], he told me that i can take the next step by contacting you. your challenge is to convince me i'm not going crazy, i dont want to take the next step to challenge what i know as reality on my own. hanger one super soldier scared me to my knee's praying to god. you  might have knock a brick lose in my mental wall blocks. there are things in my past i can not explain. when i was 14 i began to play paintball, at age 15 i was a general in a scenario game leading 200 soldiers. i'm still welcome any time i want to play with pilots at h.A.F.B. the range master says i give the soldier decent competition in assisting gorilla war fare training.

  i really need some professional help if you want to pursue the super solider story with me. you have already tap open pandoras box with me. please tell me i'm not part of this. but if you can prove to me i'm not going crazy, i have answers to share with humanity.
content.summary: My ex- fiance refused to look at this mother ship craft that block the sky out.

content.detailedDescription:
It was nov 1985, my mother is driving home with myself, my sister, and my friend from a shopping trip. it was approximately 7 pm and we were driving down read street heading towards attleboro, ma.
 read street is a rural street and there was no traffic at the time.. my mom noticed what looked like two headlights  in the sky coming down as if to land.  she immediately assumed it was a small plane  or helicopter trying to land in the empty field.  she stoped on the side of the road assuming assistance might be needed.
 as the craft got closer to the ground we were able to see that it was a disc shaped object.  the two headlights seemingly disappeared and there was one glowing light on the bottom in a small dome and little red lights all around where the top and bottom of the disc met.
 the craft flew over the field and towards our car it hovered about 75 feet off the ground 50 feet in front of our car so we could see it through the front windshield. my mom was a smoker so her window was cracked despite the cold weather and we noticed that it made no sound at all.   my mom was in awe but the 3 girls were voicing fear & concern.
 the craft edged over to our left above a stand of trees. the stand of trees was glowing from the light in the dome.  my mom put the car in drive and edged up a few feet, the craft mimicked her movement and also moved a few feet forward. about 5 seconds later it shot off over a nearby trailer park at an unbelievable speed and was out of sight within a second or two.
 at the time, my friend and i were 15 my sister 14. when we got home we were very upset, crying, etc. my mom called the police to file a report.  at the time attleboro, wasn't a big town.   to my mother surprise the police actually answered the phone "ufo hot line"  this was in the days before 911 when you dial the standard 222–1212 for police.   my mom went on to tell them about what we saw.  they said they were aware, have had several phone calls and we're looking into it. 

 we saw this ufo on read street adjacent to the powerlines. my mom searched the newspaper the next day for any kind of information on what happened. the only thing she found was a blurb about a power outage on reed street due to a squirrel eating through a power box.
content.summary: 4 witnesses in a car, came down just above the car, hovered, moved & hovered again before taking off

content.detailedDescription:
In mid june 2012 i was in the town of mulhiem an der ruhr in germany visiting my folks and i saw something in the sky. 

i was barbecuing on the balcony,(i wasn't drinking because i was on atkins at the time) i turned around and there in the sky was a massive dull silver torpedo cigar shaped object. 

i was stunned quite frankly and then it dissolved into the sky. it was visible for maybe a second or two. i could see no surface details and no lights. it was slightly fuzzy/out of focus. it was quite high up, above where the fluffy cloud float but not up with the wispy ones, and massive. it's hard to judge it size and distance but if i stretch my arms out and upwards at 45 degrees it was a hand width or two bigger (i'm 197cm). i heard no sounds other than normal street noise. i felt that it saw me see it.

i stared at the now empty sky for a moment then rushed inside to see if anyone else had seen anything out the window in the kitchen. 

it felt a bit surreal seeing my family doing normal stuff like preparing a salad and the table. the music on the cd player sounded hollow and my legs stringy. i told them what i saw. my brother ridiculed me saying i most probably saw a zeppelin as there is a zeppelin port near mulhiem and that i should smoke another one. i repeated my question to my sister but she said she saw nothing.

i know what zeppelins look and sound like as they fly about quite often here in the summertime but this thing was no zeppelin. 

i went back out the barbecue shaken. i reoriented the barbecue so as to not have my back to the west.
content.summary: Large cigar shaped object appeared in the skies to the west of my position then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: We live in santa fe nm in a small studio my husband my daughter and myself. wehave had reoccurring abductions for a while now. this new stretch of occurances has led me to file this 2nd report. i did have a lady and a man call and leave msgs to speak to me however when i returned the calls i never heared back again. i really need to speak with someone this is really upsetting. thanks.
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription: Call me. i have additional information.
content.summary: Video video taken 5-6 feet from objects, objects about 5 foot altitude

content.detailedDescription:
on wednesday april 29, 2015 at about 6:00 p.M. i was out in my yard admiring the sunrise. i decided to take a few pictures. i used my samsung galaxy 5s cell phone camera.  i used a couple effects on the phone to try and dim the brightness of the sun. i used a vintage and vignette and it seemed to work. i couldn't see anything beside the very bright sun. i did not expect to see anything else in the picture until i noticed the orb and the sphere in the picture. i zoomed in on the orb and saw the other bright objects on the sphere. i live on the san carlos apache reservation in arizona. the reservation is about 2 hours east of phoenix arizona. i showed the pictures to my co-workers and they mentioned on the day prior she saw 20 black hawk helicopters flying east bound towards new mexico.

  on monday april 27, 2015 at about 5:45 a.M. i took a picture of the triplets mountain with a dark cloud just as the sun was going to rise. i found in my picture later in the afternoon a black object.  i took two or three photos seconds after each other but only one had the black object.

  i had no intentions of photographing a ufo but it happened, purely coincidence. i have seen ufo's before but this time i think i got the pictures to prove it.

   thank you for time
content.summary: Found in my photographs a sphere with other lights

content.detailedDescription: Parked at carroll airport noticed hexagon craft with orange striped lights on left and white light by what appeared to be a door.The craft rose 100ft. off the ground hovered turned into a car with hazards on travelled west turned back into the hexagon craft rose up went to the east hovered descended to the road turned into a car with hazards on again and repeated this over and over for five minutes.My car lights where blinking off and on despite the car being off and no keys in the ignition.
content.summary: Hexagon craft orange striped and white lights

content.detailedDescription: We had been gone,earlier in the.Day,got back around 11:00p.M.,watched news,then forgotafter,watching the news,i left my wallet outside in car. i went to go get it,turned around,looked up on hill,across the st.Saw green lights shinning down from hill. i was so stunned,i was like omg,what in the world is that!!!!!Then it hit me,ufo,ran through my mind!!!!!Ran in and got my husband,and son!!!!! grabed my cellphone ,to take pictures!!!!!! it all happened at midnight,lasted 20 minutes. i called next door neighbor,she looked out and saw it too!!!!!! she was so surprised,she said she had never seen anything like that before!!!!!! the object would flash green beams then disappear,then reappear in the sky,on hill,several times,till it finally never came on again,then disappear,never came back on,after waiting for it to reappear.
content.summary: I had went out to the car,to get wallet,looked up,saw the object glowing green light,beams also,shooting down from hill to land

content.detailedDescription: Family of about 20 camping for the evening east of yuma.  a large object was sighted approaching yuma. object hovered over yuma. seemed to absorb all sound. took off rapidly to the south to a higher altitude and stopped, turned on a dime, took off again to the west at a higher altitude stopped again,  then took off out of the atmosphere.  a family member was a us marine and said the planes would be out after it in 10 seconds.  when there was no military response, the family member had us all pack up and leave.  the next day the family member returned from base after having reported the incident and indicated that we was "ordered" to not have sen anything.   the new paper  reported that a docked ship in san diego miss-fired a missle while in dock.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Object hovered over yuma. seemed to absorb all sound. took off rapidly, stopped, turned on a dime, took off, stopped again,  then took off out of the atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i like to explore back roads. we were travelling roughly east on a clear day on a dirt road several miles northeast of auburn looking for a route from highway 49 to highway 20 (or another dirt road) that would go all the way around the east perimeter of the very large beale air force base east of marysville. driving slowly through the low foothills on what i believe is the only road around that side of the base, we topped a little rise and before us and a little to the east of us, at an unknown distance, but seemingly less than 500 yards we saw two horizontal cylinders of unknown size, hovering broadside to us, just above the trees, close to each other, pointed slightly away from us toward i would say ene.  my impression was that the one in front and slightly above the other was moving when we sighted them, slowly, like a boat drifting in the water. for the duration of the less than one minute sighting the objects appeared stationary. we stopped for just a few seconds. as we rolled down this little rise, the trees before us blocked our view. we didn't see them take off, disappear or do anything at all. we just saw these two cylinders that didn't make any sense. they looked like very large shiny silvery metal fuselages with blunt ends, no wings, no insignia, no sound, nothing. 

my immediate mental response on this and the other time i saw cylinders from my home some thirty miles east of this sighting was that this was some secret military stuff and it frightened me because beale was right there. we were driving along a perimeter fence when we saw them. we discussed it briefly and neither of us really wanted to explore it further. it was creepy. we didn't talk to anybody about it. didn't report it to anybody. i still think they are some kind of military deal. we both want to see any pictures or descriptions of other folks' sightings of cylinders. so far i have found only blurry images or streaks online.  i'm not certain whether we were in yuba county or nevada county at the time of the sighting. i would really like to see some pictures of similar things.

we are willing to answer any questions, but we really don't have much to add. that was the whole deal and we just drove on, arriving at highway 20 near the north gate of beale about fifteen minutes later. as i recall, neither of us mentioned it again until i told my wife about the sighting from our yard. i can't even say for certain that they looked like exactly the same thing, but certainly identical in behavior... hovering, silent, etc. actually, hovering doesn't feel like the right word. stationary. that's the right word.
content.summary: Through our car windshield wife and i saw 2 stationary horizontal cylinders low and seemingly close

content.detailedDescription: I didn't smoke in my house so i went outside to have a cigarette late one night.  i was looking towards the city when i saw a light moving  from the north east to the east over it.  i thought it was a plane at first but something was off about it.  so i stood there and watched as i smoked.  this is where the story gets strange,  it was like it knew i was watching it.  it stopped moving to the east and turned west to come towards me. at first i was happy thinking i am going to at least see what it is. it slowed to a crawl as it got closer to me and when it was directly above me it stopped and just hovered there.  it was so huge it blocked out the star light and all i could see was this huge black triangular shape hovering above me.  it made no sound at all, it did not displace the air, nothing just absolute quite.  it was solid black and from below it i could not see anything identifying about it, no lights or markings, just black.  it hovered there for i don't know how long. then it just disappeared, i was left standing alone on my back porch holding a cigarette butt.  i don't know how i lost sight of it, i don't remember, just next thing i knew it was gone.  i didn't say anything cause part of me thought this has to be some kind of secret military plane and some crew member thought it would be funny to mess with my head.  but i can't forget it, god knows i have tired.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Solid black triangle

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting outside my house, smoking a cigarette,  looking across the street. from this angle, one can see the ridge of hog-back mountain over the house across the street. while talking to my mother, a green glowing ball fell from the sky and clearly went behind the mountain. at first i thought it was a flare from a bottle-rocket, but there was no sound or other lights usually associated with fireworks. it's common for people to light off bottle-rockets in this area during holidays, and i'm accustomed to what this looks like. the green orb moved at an arc rather than a straight line, and clearly went behind hog-back mountain, as i could see the outline of the mountain as the light descended. hog-back is at least 3 to 4 miles from my house, and as this object appeared to descend behind the mountain, it had to be larger than a spark from a bottle-rocket.
content.summary: Green orb fell from sky and descended behind mountain

content.detailedDescription:
Solã­a sentarme en el jardã­n de mi casa con mi hija de 6 aã±os (en el momento del hecho)a observar las estrellas , satã©lites y estrellas fugaces .Mi hija siempre terminaba preguntando algo sobre ovnis y segãºn la edad le contaba lo que me parecã­a conveniente . esa noche de mayo , no recuerdo  la fecha exacta , no habã­a luna y hacã­a mas calor de lo habituã¡l para ese mes , por lo que estabamos disfrutando la noche calma y sin viento . 
sorpresivamente desde el este aparecen 2 objetos circulares, volando entre si a una distancia de 3 veces su diã¡metro . 
cuando se encuentran sobre nuestra vertical , hacen un suave giro al noroeste ,el que iba a un costado pasa al frente y se pierden a la distancia . 
no emitieron sonido ni luces propias . solo eran claramente visibles por la luz de la ciudad que los iluminaba desde abajo .Los bordes eran muy definidos , con forma de arandela metã¡lica . el centro estaba negro como el cielo . no puedo diferenciar si en el centro era hueco o solo no reflejaba la luz por no ser plano . ambos presentaban un movimiento ondulatorio , como cuando cae una tapa redonda al piso .Las ondulaciones eran de 1 segundo aprox. 
todo el evento durã³ 8 segundos aprox., lo que tardã© en decirle a mi hija "mirã¡ eso es un ovni". el tamaã±o era como el ancho de mi pulgar con el brazo extendido .No puedo estimar el tamaã±o real ni la altura ya que no habã­a nubes para comparar . aparecieron y desaparecieron a unos 45â° del horizonte , donde ya no veiamos la luz reflejada . en todo momento mantuvieron su tamaã±o , por lo que estimo que  estaban a baja  altura .
 observã© el cielo toda mi vida (tengo 50 aã±os) , reconociendo pã¡jaros nocturnos , migratorios , aviones ,satã©lites iridium , iss,globos, tc .
 no puedo relacionar esta observaciã³n con algo conocido .Eran demasiado rã¡pidos y definidos para ser objetos  teledirigidos. ( drones?Aã±o 1998 no estaban tan desarrollados) , nubes , gas , plasma , aves , globos , reflectores ,etc. tengo experiencia laboral con equipos de laser visible  y al apuntarlos a una nube , solo se logra una mancha difusa . este evento logrã³ que me interese aãºn mã¡s en  el tema ovni .Siempre tuve la sensaciã³n que fuã© una especie de demostraciã³n "dedicada" mi hija y a mi , como diciendo "acã¡ estamos, convencete ".
content.summary: 2 arandelas perfectamente definidas reflejaban las luces de la ciudad /noche sin luna

content.detailedDescription:
I observed an object in the southern hemisphere that appeared to travel north, the object stopped it's trajectory and then hovered, or was stationary. i thought it was possibly the space station or a satellite until it became stationary.
i have digital video of the event that shows the objects position relative to the moon and what i think is venus.
content.summary: Object appeared in the southern hemisphere and traveled north then appeared to hover.

content.detailedDescription: Photo taken with digital camera, not visible to the eye. appears to be oval with dark center, power field above, appears to be hovering above the high tension power lines.There were approximately 20 photos taken, this is the only one with a subject in it.
content.summary: Oval in shape, dark center, light exterior body, power field

content.detailedDescription:
On may 2, 2015 at approximately 11:35pm, i was traveling north on the west part of 465. i was traveling at approximately 65mph. i believe i was located somewhere between 10th st. and 38th or 56th street on the west side. 

i noticed three lights that formed a triangle in front of me. a nearly perfect triangle. mind you this was not over my head as in a triangle, but if the face of a triangle were facing me. i noticed it to my left of my windshield, and i as i drove i observed it simply moving across the sky as if it were traveling across my windshield. it did not appear to move quickly nor did it change direction. the three lights never wavered in their location. they never broke the shape of the triangle. all three lights moved at the same speed as if it were one large object moving across the sky.

behind it, i noticed two more lights, but they did not appear to form a shape. the lights were orange orbs. 

i lost sight of the object, because i was unable to pull over and observe the object more because of the highway i was on. i simply couldn't follow it due to my travel. if i were on a different road, then i would've pulled over. 

now, i'm also open to the fact that these were lights behind me, like street lamps reflecting off my window. however, the lights would need to be directly behind me and either they would need to be moving, or my car would need to be turning, and i was traveling straight ahead.
content.summary: I witnessed three lights moving in the same direction without ever losing the shape they created.

content.detailedDescription: Four digital photos taken approx 30 after sunset, 65 degrees, no wind, no aircraft observed in the area. this was not a bird etc, the subject was able to cover approximately 1 mile or more in less than 2 seconds.The long slender body was not rigid and appeared to be semi-transparent with a rotating corkscrew power field. its moves were deliberate and did not appear to be random.
content.summary: Rotating corkscrew type of power field, flexible, not a solid structure, appeared to have knowledge of flight path.

content.detailedDescription: Appearing brighter than a planet or star, a large orange light moved slowly from west to east for approximately one minute, then vanished. i was standing outside smoking a cigarette, watching the lights of many airplanes (i live about two miles from the charlotte airport), when i noticed the light. it did not pulse or waver, the light being bright and steady. when it vanished, the light simply went out. it was the speed of the object which attracted my attention, being slower than a satellite or airplane. the size was also interesting being so much larger than a star or planet, but seeming to be extremely high up. it moved in a straight line, and it's speed remained consistent.
content.summary: Bright orange light, moved slowly for a minute w to e then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Half mile on dirt road west of glidden iowa saw while standing on hill from west hexagon shaped craft with white light by what appeared to be a door cross above me less than a 100 yards then from the east an octagon shaped craft with two very large round engines in rear and red light past above the hexagon craft. the hexagon craft passed me to north east tilted 45 degrees then went up.
content.summary: 2 ufos past each other directly above me

content.detailedDescription: First time seeing a flying disc, it was white. seen medium and large black triangles with white lights red lights respectively. seen a flying diamond before and a flying weapon.
content.summary: Saw flying disc outside window

content.detailedDescription:
Ovnis en natabuela ecuador

examinar la foto, es en imbabura ecuador, desde las tolas de natabuela.

la mã¡s reciente es tomada el 1 de mayo del 2015 (5:30 pm), la que se le ve como bola de energã­a.
la otra la que se le ve triangular, es del 26 de abril domingo, 2015 (4:30 - 5:20).


las naves a mi pensar se dirigen al lago san pablo, y lagunas de mojanda que quedan mã¡s al sur del sitio. en esos lugares hay agua pura y sitios arqueolã³gicos
content.summary: Objetos triangular oscuro y una bola de energã­a aparecen en fotografã­as

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i observed a ufo on march 21st at 8:15 pm and watched it for 15 minutes. we were discussing it yesterday and found that her perception of it was completely different than mine. 
my observation was 2 rows of very bright lights. one green and one red. we watched it fly in from a high altitude and make sharp right angle turns then stop then drop suddenly then back up again. it appeared to be 5 miles away then came directly towards our position and then turn to the left about 500 feet from us at about 500 feet away. it emitted a low hum from the rear as it turned. when it turned it we lost sight of it because it was on the other side of our house. we went to the front and saw it again but it was further away. we called a neighbor from his garage to see it. he used his cell phone to record it but i found out later that it just showed a small faint light on the recording.
when my wife and i were driving last night we started talking about it again and she said she saw it as a circle of lights with an outer row of red lights and the green lights were inside the circle. that is completely different from what i saw. i saw two straight lines of lights. i thought it very odd that we could both see the same object and have two completely different memories of what we saw.
content.summary: I reported this earlier but when discussing it with my wife found that she saw it differently.

content.detailedDescription: Crystal clear night star gazing south yorkshire  and spotted what looked like a star traveling eastern stars from a north south direction at a rate unknown looked to be within the stars range but could move from star to star within 2-3 seconds, verry unusual flyt path, curve and straight (no plane or satalight ) the size of the stars them self , at least  2 mins fly time , the navigation and speed was fenomonal
content.summary: Following eastern stars billions light ch star unusual traveling line

content.detailedDescription: While driving in remote mountain area south of sate college, pa stopped at overlook to observe scenery. took three photos in succession with iphone 6. upon looking at photos next day noted large blurry black object in one photo. do not recall seeing any birds while at site. site on greenville rd. in rothrock state forest. photo taken looking west. time noted on photo is 1:30 pm.  took first photo then moved a few feet to left and took two more photos within a few seconds of one another. the object appears on the second of three photos.
content.summary: Took photo showing object that was not present when taken.

content.detailedDescription: I viewed this unusual object in the sky while flying from beijing to detroit on may 2, 2015. i was seated on the left side of the aircraft and noticed behind the left wing was a very bright white light, pulsating from red to blue. it wasn't a plane because it stayed about the same distance from us for about 30 minutes, no blinking, very pronounced in the sky, it stayed back in the same position about the whole time. i lost sight at about 30 minutes and i didn't see it leave, it just became more distant very slowly. it seem to stay at the same distance for most of the time, then it seemed like we were making distance on it before it became too difficult to see. i pointed it out to my husband who agreed it was unusual. it was somewhere in western canada after we passed over alaska.
content.summary: Bright white light that pulsated from red to blue

content.detailedDescription: I was on rt 287 on my way to work when i witnessed the ufo. i noticed it because it was huge and didnt look like a plane. at first i thought it was an airplane, but it was much bigger and more oval like. it was hovering in the sky, i took a picture on my cell phone, i looked down too see the picture, looked back up and i was gone. it disappeared within a few seconds of me turning away.
content.summary: I was on my way to work and saw it hovering in the sky, i took a picture and when i looked at my phone and looked back up it was gone.
